titles: A certificate of what hath been done upon the poll-money, as well upon the act of poll-money, as upon the order of review of the same.
author: England and Wales. Parliament. House of Commons.
publisher: by Robert Barker, printer to the Kings most Excellent Majesty: and by the assignes of John Bill,
notes: "The form of certificate with blanks alluded to in Ordinance of 29 Nov."--Steele.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
keywords: Poll tax --  Great Britain --  Early works to 1800.
